detailsTemplate.head: <html><head><link rel='stylesheet' type='text/css' href='http://cdn.zivame.com/live/css/foundation.min.css'><link rel='stylesheet' type='text/css' href='http://cdn.zivame.com/live/css/loyaltyStaticPage.css'><meta name='viewport' content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0'></head><body>
detailsTemplate.body:
Loyalty Program

How Does The Circle Of Radiance Work?

In the Circle Of Radiance, we offer you rewards based on your total Purchase Value. So, the benefits keep getting better and sexier as you go higher up!

*Purchase Value = Sum (all valid order totals) - Shipping Fees & COD Charges whenever applicable

How Do I Know Which Circle I'm In?

There are 3 circles - Bronze, Silver & Gold. You are allocated to a specific circle based on your purchases in the past 12 months as follows:

CirclePurchase Value
Bronze₹ 2,000 - ₹ 4,999
Silver₹ 5,000 - ₹ 9,999
Gold> ₹ 10,000
  • In case of any returns, the value of the returned product(s) will be subtracted from the total Purchase Value.

What Perks Or Rewards Will I Get?

Benefits
Bronze
Silver
Gold
Exclusive Sales
Birthday/Anniversary Discount Coupons
Extra Discounts On App Checkout
Exclusive Partner Brand Offers
Exclusive Customer Service
Free Unlimited Shipping

When Will I Move Up A Circle?

  • When you make a new purchase, and the updated purchase value (after delivery) falls into a higher circle.

What Happens Once I Move Up A Circle?

  • You are entitled to all the exclusive benefits of the higher circle
  • The start & expiry dates get reset
  • New start date = date of upgrade
  • New expiry date = one year from the start date

When Will I Move Down A Circle?

  1. In Case of Tier Expiry:
    If your last 12 months' total Purchase Value (from 12 months before the expiry date) is lesser than the minimum value required for the current circle, then you'll be automatically moved down to the next lower circle.
  2. In Case of Insufficient Total Purchase Value:
    When you request a return, your total Purchase Value is revised after subtracting the value of the returned product(s). If the updated PurchaseValue falls into the range of a lower circle, then you will be automatically moved down to the lower circle.

What Happens Once I Move Down A Circle?

  • Your status and rewards will be updated
  • The start and expiry dates will be reset
    New start date = date of downgrade
    New expiry date = one year from the start date
  • Other loyalty related details will be updated

desc.login: We love having you in our circle. Enjoy the rewards and benefits of your circle every single time you shop!
desc.anonymous: You’ve got to join our circle. It’s our way of rewarding your love with a bunch of goodies, services & surprises.

howItWorks.title: How It Works:
howItWorks.desc1: The Circle Of Radiance is our loyalty program for you and the rewards are dependent on your purchase value. The benefits keep getting better and sexier as you go higher up.
howItWorks.desc2: *Purchase Value = Sum of all valid order totals minus Shipping Fees & COD Charges whenever applicable.

tierRanges.title: Circle Definition & Allocation:
tierRanges.desc1: There are 3 circles – Bronze, Silver & Gold. You are allocated to a specific circle based on your purchases done in the past 12 Months/1 Year as follows,
tierRanges.desc2: In case of any returns, the corresponding returned product(s) value will be subtracted from the purchase value.

detailInfo.title: When Do You Move Up A Circle:
desc: When you’ve made a purchase and the updated Purchase Value (after order is delivered) falls into a higher circle, then you’re eligible to move up to this higher circle and enjoy its exclusive benefits.
On moving up a circle, the start & expiry dates get reset. The start date is the date of upgrade and the expiry date is one year from the start date.
No moving up is possible for Gold circle members.

detailInfo.title: When Do You Move Down A Circle:
desc: When you’ve requested for a return, the product(s) value is reduced from your total Purchase Value and if this updated Purchase Value falls into a lower circle, then you’re eligible to move down to this lower circle.

You can also be moved down at the time of expiry. In this case, your last 12 months total Purchase Value is calculated (expiry date to 12 months before), and compared against the circles’ purchase value definitions. If it is lesser than the minimum value required for the current Circle, then you’ll be automatically moved down to the next lower circle.
On being moved down a circle, your loyalty status will be updated, along with the circle’s start and expiry dates, and all other loyalty related details.

loyalty.currentSpendToolTip: Sum of all valid order total, minus Shipping Fees and COD charges whenever applicable
loyalty.spendRequiredToUpgradeToolTip: Total Purchase Value required to upgrade to the next circle
loyalty.spendRequiredToContinueToolTip: Total Purchase Value to be achieved before your circle expiry date
loyalty.validToToolTip: The date on which your Circle of Radiance Membership expires
